channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Chicago, a Halloween weekend of immigration arrests and violence
item.description: Over the weekend there were violent clashes between federal agents, witnesses and protesters. Locals say the festivities were muted this year, and fea...

item.title: Israel says it received remains of 3 hostages from Gaza as fragile ceasefire holds
item.description: Israel says the remains of three hostages have been handed over from Gaza and will be examined by forensic experts as a month-old ceasefire holds.

item.title: Alphabet is increasingly launching “moonshot” projects as independent companies — here’s why
item.description: Despite the emphasis on detachment from ideas, X employees do have significant skin in the game when projects spin out.

item.title: Kevin Rose’s simple test for AI hardware — would you want to punch someone in the face who’s wearing it?
item.description: "As an investor, you kind of have to not only say, okay, cool tech, sure, but emotionally, how does it make me feel? And how does it make others feel ...

item.title: How this week's elections in Virginia became about ... everything
item.description: Earlier this year, "quiet" was one word to describe the Virginia race for governor. Then came DOGE, a text message scandal down ballot, a redistrictin...

item.title: Kenyan runners win men's and women's races in New York City Marathon
item.description: Kipruto, an Olympic bronze medalist, narrowly beat fellow Kenyan Alexander Mutiso in the Pro Men's race, as both men finished with a time of 2:08:09.

item.title: Fire and explosion at northwestern Mexico store leave at least 23 dead and 12 injured
item.description: A fire and explosion at a convenience store in northwestern Mexico killed at least 23 people, including children, and injured 12 others, state authori...

item.title: Sequoia’s Roelof Botha warns founders about chasing sky-high valuations as the firm doubles down on its selective approach
item.description: At Disrupt, Botha had advice for founders who are swimming in terms sheets right now.

item.title: Google pulls Gemma from AI Studio after Senator Blackburn accuses model of defamation
item.description: Senator Martha Blackburn argued Gemma’s fabrications are “not a harmless ‘hallucination,’" but rather “an act of defamation produced and distributed b...

item.title: Sam Altman says ‘enough’ to questions about OpenAI’s revenue
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman recently said that the company is doing “well more” than $13 billion in annual revenue — and he sounded a little testy when pres...

item.title: SNAP benefits cut off during shutdown, driving long lines at food pantries
Uncertainty over federal food aid grows as the shutdown fight reaches a crisis point
item.description: The twin crises at the heart of the government shutdown fight in Washington are coming to a head. The federal food assistance program is facing delays...

item.title: Ohio panel and Virginia lawmakers move forward with congressional redistricting plans
